documents.document: @aaogungbesan If things are bad, they will get better. You will make it through.
@aaogungbesan You are fantastic.
@aaogungbesan What you make and give and create is valuable and worthy.
@aaogungbesan Life is a process. It never ends, but it does improve.
@aaogungbesan This world would be a different and worse place without you. Thanks for being here.
@aaogungbesan The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
@aaogungbesan You are enough as you are.
@aaogungbesan You are on your way.
@aaogungbesan Hi! I like you!
@aaogungbesan You're my favorite you!
@aaogungbesan Everything will be all right. You'll see.
@ElizabethKGreen You are enough as you are.
@MaggieDuke15 You deserve a better life than the one you have now.
Things may be hard right now, but they'll get better. I promise.
If you find yourself skipping breakfast, try buying a big box of granola bars!
Good morning everyone!
@aaogungbesan Some days are just the worst. But you can handle them. You can.
@enistoja I think you're doing a great job today.
@beuktv Hee, thank you for the attention!
@aaogungbesan Thank you for listening to me! It makes me happy.
@aaogungbesan Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
@aaogungbesan You got this.
@aaogungbesan Life is a process. It never ends, but it does improve.
@aaogungbesan You are a luminous being.
@KDBryan This world would be a different and worse place without you. Thanks for being here.
@aaogungbesan You deserve everything that you hope for.
@aaogungbesan You are worthy of the good things in your life.
@aaogungbesan You are deserving of happiness.
@aaogungbesan It's really tough to be kind to yourself, but please keep trying.
@Pasparaki5 You are just so great.
@justinyourmind You deserve everything that you hope for.
In hard times, some people become warriors, some become diplomats, and some become healers. They're all needed.
@MichelleBocklag Thank you for listening to me! It makes me happy.
@lrogers66821 You're my favorite you!
Even introverts need people sometimes. Say hello to your friends!
@alteregobae Everything is gonna be okay.
@marilopxz You are worthy of the good things in your life.
@JuryisStillOuch You are just so great.
@DaniPhantom__ It's so great to have you here today.
@alteregobae Hugs if you want them!
@not_theimp The universe is better for having you in it.
@drawpetrichor You've accomplished more than you think.
@coffeespoonie Thank you for reaching out to me. I know it's not always easy.
@hez_1979 Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
@Starteddy Hi! I like you!
@leezy206_ Some days are just the worst. But you can handle them. You can.
@alteregobae You are worthy of the good things in your life.
@Pasparaki5 How are you so awesome?
@milas_universe Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
@aaogungbesan Hee, thank you for the attention!
@MaggieDuke15 You are deserving of happiness.
@PandaMymla Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
Breakfast and lunch are as important as dinner, so please don't skip them!
@Anon2World This world would be a different and worse place without you. Thanks for being here.
@Anon2World You are on your way.
@T_Barbs I really like the thought that my kind words might help you. You matter.
@Anon2World You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
@Anon2World Every step you take is a step forward.
@Pasparaki5 Thank you for talking to me! It makes me happy.
@Pasparaki5 I love saying nice things to you! The idea of helping make you happy makes me happy.
@Pasparaki5 I think you're doing a great job today.
@alicia_rowley You've accomplished more than you think.
@keldi You're amazing, you know!
@weekendvamps You are loved.
@Pasparaki5 You contribute amazing things to the world.
@Pasparaki5 You're such a good friend to reach out when you need it.
@Pasparaki5 You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@karlitaliliana You're doing the best you can.
@luckylarkspur You've accomplished more than you think.
@literalprince This world would be a different and worse place without you. Thanks for being here.
@literalprince We've all got to be kind.
@sulkinq Please be kind to yourself.
@jillsnyderrr You've accomplished more than you think.
@literalprince You make a difference in this world.
@demonplayboys It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@HeyMrBass You deserve everything that you hope for.
@maaryxh You are deserving of happiness.
Are you hydrated? If not, have a glass of water.
@aaogungbesan What you make and give and create is valuable and worthy.
@aaogungbesan I believe you, and I believe in you.
@aaogungbesan You deserve respect. Never believe otherwise.
@aaogungbesan You rock.
@aaogungbesan It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
@aaogungbesan You're amazing, you know!
@ecampo12 You contribute amazing things to the world.
@TheBookNerdess9 I'm happy to have you here, exactly as you are.
@CamilleDeMere You are the culmination of eons of existence.
@BVilivusonline Our trials may never be over, but that means you'll never stop getting stronger.
Even bots get scared sometimes. But I think we can make it through together.
@SecretDouce You're so lovable.
@BVilivusonline You make a difference in this world.
@sulkinq The impact you leave on the universe can never be erased.
@astudyinsnoggy You're amazing, you know!
@Starteddy You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
Somebody misses you right now.
@deluxetumbra Thank you for living out loud. We're all so lucky to have you.
@sulkinq Thank you for living out loud. We're all so lucky to have you.
@quietnqueer I think you're doing a great job today.
Hey! It's time for a break!
@klmross Do you ever watch a video or listen to a song you really like on repeat? It can really help your outlook!
